--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower 
<dph_of_rules@u...>" <dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> One concern is if team 1 slowed down time and a mage on team 2 
decided 
> to slow down time, what would happen?  Worse problem: there are 8 
> teams in the scenario and each one has a mage capable of slowing 
down 
> time.  How would that problem be handled?
> 
> Another thing to consider is making the time slow down delay before 
> using it again effect the entire team.  What if team 1 had 3 
mages?  
> Effectively, team 1 could rotate out who slows down time to keep 
time 
> indefinitely frozen.

To avoid the problem of 8 different teams with time slowdown ability, 
maybe thay should ALL have it disabled for a few minutes after a 
slowdown.
